entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 01:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 7.8°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
